metadata.description: Unique id for the scheduled alert rule

properties.description: Display incidents in which medium sensitivity HR information was placed at risk by user sharing.
properties.displayName: Cognni Incidents for Medium Sensitivity HR Information
properties.query:
let mediumRisk = 2;
let hr = 'HR Information';
CognniIncidents_CL 
| where Severity == mediumRisk
| where informationType_s == hr
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(5h)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = userId_s
